original_text: Moses and Aaron did just as the Lord had commanded. He raised his staff in the presence of Pharaoh and his officials and struck the water of the Nile, and all the water was changed into blood.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 명령하신 대로 행하여 바로와 그의 신하의 목전에서 지팡이를 들어 나일 강을 치니 그 물이 다 피로 변하고

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron did just as the Lord had commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 모세와 아론은 주께서 명하신 대로 정확히 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: He raised his staff in the presence of Pharaoh and his officials
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바로와 그의 신하들 앞에서 지팡이를 들어 올렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and struck the water of the Nile
and all the water was changed into blood
